entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts. He stopped talking suddenly and sat back down after Professor Umbridge interrupted him.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a new teacher at Hogwarts who interrupted Dumbledore's speech. She stood up to make a speech and was met with surprise from the staff and students.

entities.name: sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is a member of the Hogwarts staff who showed her surprise at Professor Umbridge's interruption by raising an eyebrow, which got lost in her hair.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a member of the Hogwarts staff who showed her surprise at Professor Umbridge's interruption by thinning her mouth.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge interrupted Dumbledore's speech, causing him to stop talking and sit back down.
Dumbledore was interrupted by Professor Umbridge while he was speaking.
